verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: plans] [ARG1: to take a tougher approach to families that enter the U.S. illegally by separating parents from their children , instead of keeping them in detention together] .

The Trump administration plans to take a tougher approach to families [ARG0: that] enter the U.S. illegally by [V: separating] [ARG1: parents] [ARG2: from their children] , instead of keeping them in detention together .
